author: Joe Renaud
comment: The weather data is way off for my location. Dev is using decimal pt instead of whole # in forcast temps so the # all jumble together. Emailed dev after I paid for full version and they didn't reply! Horrible app save your money and buy a different one. The pictures do not match what you get in app. Make some changes and I will be happy to change my rating!

author: Chris Andersson
comment: I can set the watch face to 24h mode but the time in the forecast section still shows 12h mode.
title: Nice but...

author: Scott Bird
comment: Your faces are some of the best out there but weather info on all of them is completely inaccurate

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
Could you please give us more information about your situation in detail.

Thank you.

title: Inaccurate Data

author: Joey Heistand
comment: Out of all the watch faces out there I like this one the best
title: Great watch face

comment: After 1 day of use,  it becomes stunned (blanked), doesn' show any information anymore. If I could refund, I would do immediately. NOT RECOMMENDED!
1. It doesn't show SOLAR EVENTS 2. It doesn't show FORECAST 3. It doesn't show BAR. WIND HUMID. TEMP.  - Singapore

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your comment.
Sorry for your inconvenience.
We are now coping with that problem.
For additional information,please feel free to contact our email address.
Thank you.

author: Michael Schneider
comment: Just got my moto 360 2nd geration watch today as a late Christmas gift from my parents and the battery life is great
title: Awsome

author: Robbie Bledsoe
comment: The data I want all in one screen.  Dev has even added features since I bought it.  I have tried other watch faces but this is the one I always go back to!
title: My favorite

author: David A
comment: My favorite daily driver that I keep coming back to time and time again!
title: My Favorite

author: Jereck Provance
comment: No bugs yet. Most problems I read were fixed within the settings. Just had to figure out what some of the settings actually did. Other than that it's been my watch face since I got my watch 3-4 months ago
title: Works as displayed.

author: Dusty Manion
comment: I have this on the lg urbane (I just saw you have this face specific for my watch) I've been using it for months... it's awesome! I only wish for one thing added and that is for it to display my phones current signal strength... thanks
title: Awesome watch face

author: R.K.
comment: Easy to Read, data-intensive, and cool  display. There are other watch faces with more data, but a lot of the information is almost too small to see.  This watch face is one of the best compromises.
title: Easy to read data-intensive watch face

author: Phil Cassell
comment: This app is really neat and lots of information however it is a massive battery drain.  My MOTO360 can hold a charge for with constant use for about 24hrs, I added this watchface and within a few hours I was at 40%.  Need but beware of battery drain.

reply.content:

So, could you please give us your situation more in detail.

Thank you.

author: Team USA
comment: Apple watch no
title: Love the 360

author: Carter Lewellyn
comment: To fix the black and white color glitch, just open the Android Wear app on your phone and go to the settings for this watchface. Simply disable "drawing for ambient mode" and that will solve the color issues.  I really love this face but the weather information is quite inaccurate. The temperature is always off by 5-10 degrees. This is disappointing as I wanted this mainly for the weather information. I refunded.

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
Would you please send us your situation more in detail.
Please don't hesitate to contact our email address.
Thank you.

title: How to fix color glitch

comment: The developers make some great looking faces that provide a wealth of information. You can have weather, speed, combinations and some great looking clock faces.

comment: Paula
title: I love it

author: Drew Maw
comment: The weather at my location is horribly wrong.  Why not use Yahoo weather?? Please let us change the weather service provider!

comment: When you flick your wrist it starts shows black and white and when you finally get adjusted to what info your trying to look at the watch face will change color. It's very distracting and annoying nice just wished it worked.

title: I like it but annoying

author: ezridr1234
comment: Looked great for about 4 minutes, then half of the settings blacked out, all the face information went blank and my battery dropped  23% all within those same 4 minutes! Why can't anyone make a decent functional face for the things? All these homemade faces beginning with F0xx I assume are ask from the make your own face apps. They should be free until they are fully tested and working correctly.
